title: YuiKaori
text:
YuiKaori (ゆいかおり) was a Japanese idol group consisting of Yui Ogura and Kaori Ishihara. The group was formed in 2009, and has released several singles and albums under the King Records label. On June 30, 2017, the group went on a hiatus to focus on their individual singing careers. Prior to the disbandment, Yui Ogura commented on her blog regarding the disbandment on April 5, 2017.
